contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=259 |maint= |map=Route 259-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= |alternate_name= |length_km=37 |length_round=1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page (?), Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=North |direction_b=South |terminus_a=[[Image:qc132.svg|15px]] near [[Nicolet, Quebec|Nicolet]] |terminus_b=[[Image:qc122.svg|15px]] in [[Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil, Quebec (parish)|Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil]] |previous_type=QC |previous_route=257 |next_type=QC |next_route=261 |cities=Nicolet |junction= [[Image:Quebec Autoroute 20.svg|15px]] in [[Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil, Quebec (parish)|Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil]] |}} '''Route 259''' is a north/south highway on the south shore of the [[St. Lawrence River]] in Quebec, Canada. Its northern terminus is in [[Nicolet, Quebec|Nicolet]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 132|Route 132]] and its southern terminus is in [[Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil, Quebec (parish)|Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 122|Route 122]]. ==Municipalities along Route 259== * [[Nicolet, Quebec|Nicolet]] * [[Sainte-Monique, Centre-du-Québec, Quebec|Sainte-Monique]] * [[Sainte-Perpétue, Centre-du-Québec, Quebec|Sainte-Perpétue]] * [[Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil, Quebec (parish)|Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil]] ==See also== * [[List of Quebec provincial highways]] ==References== <references/> ==External links== * [http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&saddr=nicolet&daddr=Rang+le+Petit-St-Esprit%2FRTE-259+%4046.175516,+-72.533140+to:46.007097,-72.333984&hl=en&geocode=7364461899804094409,46.175516,-72.533140&mra=dme&mrcr=0&mrsp=2&sz=13&via=1&sll=46.011389,-72.327461&sspn=0.054842,0.154495&ie=UTF8&ll=46.137977,-72.423248&spn=0.43773,1.235962&z=10 Route 259] on Google Maps * [http://www.inforoutiere.qc.ca/fr/carte_routiere/index.asp Provincial Route Map (Courtesy of the Quebec Ministry of Transportation)] {{fr icon}} {{Secondary Highways in Quebec (200-series)}} [[Category:Quebec Routes|259]] {{Quebec-road-stub}}
